      WriteBufferHelper(java.io.RandomAccessFile vol, Volume volume)

    • Constructor Detail

      • WriteBufferHelper

        public WriteBufferHelper(java.io.RandomAccessFile vol,
                         Volume volume)
        This Buffer Helper facilitates the buffered writing of the Volume's random access file's data to a file.
        Parameters:
        vol - This is the Random Access File associated with the Volume
        volume - This would be the Volume of the file system.

    • Method Detail

      • write_inode_to_file

        public void write_inode_to_file(int inode_number,
                                Ext2File file)
        This will write all the contents of an inode associated with a file to the Ext2 File itself.
        Parameters:
        inode_number - The inode number associated with the file.
        file - This is the file to be written to.
